attributes.action: Respect our democratic decision, leave the EU or ignite a revolution for reform
attributes.additional_details:
On June the 23rd the democratic decision was made to leave the EU, leave marginally won with 51.9% to 48.1% majority vote. 

Regardless of your personal opinion on this issue, it was a massive win for democracy.  

Now it looks like that democracy is under threat with petitions of re-referendums and government scaremongering in support. 

I would like to firmly propose that if our ANY democratic decisions are NOT upheld for a period of 2 years we will reform our government anyway necessary.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned declare that if the democratic decision to leave the EU is not respected and a second referendum is held, that we will use our democratic powers to reform our government any way necessary.

The United Kingdom is a democracy and whether right or wrong the people have spoken.
